content: drops valentine knitted drops socks with hearts in nepal drops extra 0-1223 drops design pattern no ne-210 yarn group c or a + a sizes us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 9½/10½ eu 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 to fit foot length 22 - 24 - 27 cm / 8¾ -9½ -10½ sock height folded approx 9 - 10 - 10 cm / 3½ -4 -4 materials drops nepal from garnstudio 150 g for all sizes in color no 0517 medium gray 50 g for all sizes in color no 8909 coral drops double pointed needles size 5 mm / us 8 - or size needed to get 17 sts x 22 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm worked in the round on double pointed needles top down
